LC_E.V.I.L_P7 acceptPlayerMessage: We wish to test you. Your first assignment is on the table. Take it and go.
LC_E.V.I.L_P7 completePlayerMessage: Your next assignment will be to you shortly
LC_E.V.I.L_P7 Task1: Kill 20 PMCs using a grenade launcher
LC_E.V.I.L_P7 Task2: Kill 15 targets at a distance of 100m or more with a grenade launcher
LC_E.V.I.L_P7 Task3: Kill 15 targets at a distance of 25m or less with a grenade launcher
LC_E.V.I.L_P7 description: Artem has sent for you again. I know I said I was ready last time but I mean it this time.
LC_E.V.I.L_P7 note: A challenge for those who dare.
